005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.AbstractGlobalDefinition.NameInitializer;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
013import nl.talsmasoftware.lazy4j.Lazy;
014
015public abstract class AbstractNamedInstance<
016    PARENT extends IContainer>
017    extends AbstractInstance<PARENT>
018    implements INamedInstance {
019  @NonNull
020  private final Lazy<IEnhancedQName> qname;
021  @NonNull
022  private final Lazy<IEnhancedQName> definitionQName;
023
024  /**
025   * Construct a new instance.
026   *
027   * @param parent
028   *          the parent containing the instance
029   * @param initializer
030   *          used to generate the instance qualified name
031   */
032  protected AbstractNamedInstance(@NonNull PARENT parent, @NonNull NameInitializer initializer) {
033    super(parent);
034    this.qname = ObjectUtils.notNull(Lazy.lazy(() -> initializer.apply(getEffectiveName())));
035    this.definitionQName = ObjectUtils.notNull(Lazy.lazy(() -> initializer.apply(getName())));
036  }
037
038  @SuppressWarnings("null")
039  @Override
040  public final IEnhancedQName getQName() {
041    return qname.get();
042  }
043
044  @SuppressWarnings("null")
045  @Override
046  public final IEnhancedQName getReferencedDefinitionQName() {
047    return definitionQName.get();
048  }
049}
